Package com.lpoo.bombic.Tools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidController
    Handles android input
    B2WorldCreator
    Creates the physics world, getting the objects from the map.
    Constants
    Constants used in the game
    InputController
    Handles players input
    MultiPlayerInputController  
    StorageLevels
    Responsible for loading and saving the available levels in a file.
    WorldContactListener
    Responsible for dealing with the world collisions.
